title: New: R I T U A L – The Fall
content:
Anonymity, gaps between letters, unrevealing artwork… UK outfit R I T U A L have it all.

Their debut track, The Fall, recalls the likes of James Blake, Rhye and recent Hype Machine favourites HONNE; it’s a beautifully sparse electronic trip through deserted streets. No doubt set to become the latest in a long line of ‘buzzbands’, the group, described by Complex as “equal parts videographer, producer, live instrumentalist and singer”, are well and truly onto something rather special. Check out The Fall below, officially released on 1 September, and follow R I T U A L on Twitter.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
